paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Asp38Ala, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: Familial transthyretin amyloidosis with symptoms of orthostatic hypotension and chronic diarrhea.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Cardiac amyloidosis with autonomic dysfunction and chronic gastrointestinal symptoms.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Gene analysis found the transthyretin variant Asp38Ala.

individual_records.phenotype_details: No symptoms and normal echocardiographic findings.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: His son had the same mutation but that his three daughters did not.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with familial transthyretin amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family; the proband is affected while his son is unaffected.
variants.additional_notes: This is the first case report of ATTR Asp38Ala in a Korean.
key_quotes: Gene analysis found the transthyretin variant Asp38Ala.
His son had the same mutation but that his three daughters did not.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
